faqs.topic: I cannot see my board, medium, class and subject
faqs.description: Your State does not currently support all boards, mediums, classes and subjects. As soon as your State adds them, you will see it in the list

faqs.topic: I have downloaded content, but I am unable to play it because it says that I need the Internet
faqs.description: You may have downloaded YouTube content. You can play YouTube content only when you are online. Connect the computer to the Internet try again.

faqs.topic: I need to update my DIKSHA desktop app
faqs.description: Connect your computer to the Internet and check https://diksha.gov.in/desktop/latest for the latest app version

faqs.topic: I do not have access to a laptop with an Internet connection, but I want to add or update content on the desktop app
faqs.description:
If you have a mobile phone, download the DIKSHA mobile app from the google playstore. 
Browse for the content in the app. 
Download the content from the DIKSHA library. 
Copy it on a pendrive or SD card and upload it to the DIKSHA desktop app.

faqs.topic: I do not find content for a particular topic, or I find the content irrelevant
faqs.description: Browse DIKSHA's online library to search for the content. If it is still unavailable, send your feedback about content to the State SCERT

To speed up the app performance, do the following:
Go to your computerâ€™s system configuration. The minimum configuration should be:
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Dual Core Processor

If your computer matches or exceeds this configuration, restart the app.
After doing this, if it is still slow, go to Task Manager, select all unused background processes and click End Task

faqs.topic: I am unable to copy content to a pendrive
faqs.description:
To copy the content to a pen drive, do the following:
  • Go to your computer Settings. Check if the USB drive is write-protected. If it is, disable the protection
  • Check if the pen drive has free space. Delete unwanted files from the pendrive

faqs.topic: I had loaded content on my pendrive, but now I see that it is empty
faqs.description:
Your pendrive or computer may be infected with a virus. Check that:
* You have an anti virus software installed on your machine
* Your pendrive is write-protected before you plug it into unknown machines

faqs.topic: It takes time to copy content to and from my pendrive
faqs.description: The time taken to copy depends on the size of the content file. Some large textbooks take time to copy. We recommend that you do not stop the process in between. Doing so may lead to inconsistent files.

faqs.topic: My computer does not have any free space because of DIKSHA content
faqs.description: Delete downloaded content from the My Downloads tab of the app to free up space on your computer

faqs.topic: Unable to install DIKSHA Desktop application on my Ubuntu system
faqs.description:
To install DIKSHA Desktop application on your ubuntu system:

1) Open your terminal

2) Run the command cd to change the directory to where the exe file is downloaded. For example, if the exe is saved in the downloads folder, then run the command cd Downloads

3) Run the command sudo dpkg -i

On successfully running this command the application is launched

constants.knowMoreMsg: What more would you like to know?
constants.resolveMsg: Look through the list to resolve your issue
constants.tellMoreMsg: Tell us more about the problem you faced
constants.triggerEmailMsg: After you add details in the text box and tap the Initiate email button, we will trigger an email on your behalf. You can add further details and/or attach files there.
